Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting Detailswell i took my dog outside and looked up into the sky like i always do when outside at night with her. i saw the object directly above me then saw it dancing and going up and down. i could tell imediatly that it wasnt a plane or helicopter. i didnt hear anything. i just felt intense fear and the urge to get in my car and bolt. but i kept standing there looking waiting to see what it was going to do next. i went inside and tried to call a friend but couldnt get ahold of her. i went back outside and called my dog to me and she noticed it too. i saw her looking at it as she ran for the door.
Summary: a circle of light danced in the sky and got closer to me
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Three Rivers
There were no other sightings in Three Rivers on or around February 1st 2006
